section.p: As indicated in the abstract, we had the following two goals for our project:

section.name: 1. Web service infrastructure for Jadabs
section.p: The first goal was to offer a web service infrastructure which supported three classes of devices: A mobile device, a server and a proxy.

section.name: 2. SBB WebService using our infrastructure
section.p: The second goal was the SBB WebService which offers the user timetable requests to the SBB server.
